info.title: Security Center
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Supported regulatory compliance standards details and state

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Supported regulatory compliance details state for selected standard

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceStandardName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance standard object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: All supported regulatory compliance controls details and state for selected standard

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceStandardName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance standard object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Selected regulatory compliance control details and state

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceStandardName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance standard object

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceControlName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance control object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Details and state of assessments mapped to selected regulatory compliance control

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceStandardName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance standard object

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceControlName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance control object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Supported regulatory compliance details and state for selected assessment

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceStandardName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance standard object

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceControlName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance control object

parameters.name: regulatoryComplianceAssessmentName
parameters.description: Name of the regulatory compliance assessment object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

RegulatoryComplianceAssessment.description: Regulatory compliance assessment details and state

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

RegulatoryComplianceAssessmentList.description: List of regulatory compliance assessment response

assessmentDetailsLink.description: Link to more detailed assessment results data. The response type will be according to the assessmentType field

assessmentType.description: The expected type of assessment contained in the AssessmentDetailsLink

description.description: The description of the regulatory compliance assessment

failedResources.description: The given assessment's related resources count with failed state.

passedResources.description: The given assessment's related resources count with passed state.

skippedResources.description: The given assessment's related resources count with skipped state.

state.description: Aggregative state based on the assessment's scanned resources states

unsupportedResources.description: The given assessment's related resources count with unsupported state.

RegulatoryComplianceControl.description: Regulatory compliance control details and state

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

RegulatoryComplianceControlList.description: List of regulatory compliance controls response

description.description: The description of the regulatory compliance control

failedAssessments.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance assessments of the given control with a failed state

passedAssessments.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance assessments of the given control with a passed state

skippedAssessments.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance assessments of the given control with a skipped state

state.description: Aggregative state based on the control's supported assessments states

RegulatoryComplianceStandard.description: Regulatory compliance standard details and state

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

RegulatoryComplianceStandardList.description: List of regulatory compliance standards response

failedControls.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance controls of the given standard with a failed state

passedControls.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance controls of the given standard with a passed state

skippedControls.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance controls of the given standard with a skipped state

state.description: Aggregative state based on the standard's supported controls states

unsupportedControls.description: The number of regulatory compliance controls of the given standard which are unsupported by automated assessments

RegulatoryComplianceAssessmentName.name: regulatoryComplianceAssessmentName
RegulatoryComplianceAssessmentName.description: Name of the regulatory compliance assessment object

RegulatoryComplianceControlName.name: regulatoryComplianceControlName
RegulatoryComplianceControlName.description: Name of the regulatory compliance control object

RegulatoryComplianceStandardName.name: regulatoryComplianceStandardName
RegulatoryComplianceStandardName.description: Name of the regulatory compliance standard object
